name: VTM: Mark of the Beast
description:
A Vampire: The Masquerade Month of Darkness GameJam creation.

It's a choice based text game, with choices that matter and might bring you to victory or end you.

Explore temptation, rage, madness and passion through the eyes of a vampire just Embraced by an entity that will soon be out to end them.

Find your own way to face the challenges thrown at you, though, take heed, your journey will be filled with danger and battle. High focus on companions.

This is my very first game, scoped, planned, written and coded entirely within the month allocated for the GameJam, learning the ChoiceScript system and the in-depth lore of Vampire: The Masquerade V5 on the go.

Hope you enjoy the game, please feel free to send feedback and make sure to contact me if you run across any bugs or errors (I literally just finished the game an hour before the submission deadline, I've tested it as best I can but I'm sure there will bugs and errors, perhaps even grammatical (the shame!) I will make any necessary updates ASAP.
